text: Luiz Felipe Scolari (born 9 November 1948) is a Brazilian football manager. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rio Grande do Sul Category:Brazilian football managers Category:FC Bunyodkor managers Category:Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras managers Category:Brazil at the 2002 FIFA World Cup Category:Portugal at UEFA Euro 2004 Category:Portugal at the 2006 FIFA World Cup Category:Portugal at UEFA Euro 2008 Category:Brazil at the 2014 FIFA World Cup
title: Luiz Felipe Scolari
